items.sentence: I thought you said that you wanted to do that for Tom.
I couldn\'t help noticing that you seem to be limping.
Would it have made any difference if I had been there?
The only thing my wife knows how to cook is spaghetti.
If Tom hadn\'t gotten sick, he\'d be here with us now.
Tom is the one who told me that Mary didn\'t like him.
Tom\'s boat sprung a leak and started taking on water.
Tom\'s doctor told him he needed to get more exercise.
We\'re the ones who have to pay for your carelessness.
Did anything happen that you didn\'t expect to happen?
Is Tom the only one here who doesn't know how to swim?
Tom will probably be able to persuade Mary to do that.
As soon as I arrived at the destination, I called Tom.
Can you see the difference between these two pictures?
I waited for Tom all morning, but Tom never showed up.
Tom was astounded and fascinated by what he saw there.
You should keep the medicine box away from your child.
I'd advise you not to start anything you can't finish.
I got to the station too late to catch the last train.
Tom has never told me anything about his private life.
The reception I'm getting is really bad at the moment.
Tom isn't still in custody. He was released yesterday.
Will you please stick a 60-cent stamp on the envelope?
I can build a doghouse for your dog if you want me to.
Tom was studying French yesterday afternoon with Mary.
I'm learning to sew so that I can make myself a dress.
I don't like sewing because I can't thread the needle.
It was already after 8 o'clock, so we called it a day.
I stayed home yesterday because I had a very bad cold.
Tom said he was going to buy something, but he didn't.
It wasn't that long ago that you were just a teenager.
Even if you lose the game, you'll have another chance.
I never received the package that Tom said he sent me.
I was caught in a downpour and got soaked to the bone.
It saddens me to see how much you've misunderstood us.
Our parents allowed us to stay up until three o'clock.
Stay until everybody else leaves and then we can talk.
If you live in Boston, you probably already know that.
As far as I know, Tom has never done anything illegal.
Tom doesn't do anything without his wife's permission.
How long did it take you to drive from Boston to here?
Why didn't you ever tell me that you'd been in prison?
Why didn't you ever tell me that you'd studied French?
The express starts at six and gets into Tokyo at nine.
The bus will arrive at the station in fifteen minutes.
I think that I could swim across the river if I tried.
This is the first time that anyone has ever done this.
Tom didn't have enough money to buy food for everyone.
I admit that this may not be the best way of doing it.
I wonder whether Tom kissed Mary goodnight last night.
